s: I purchased this starter pack that came with two of the Multipurpose Sensors. The whole reason for purchasing it, was to follow a guide I found for using the sensors to monitor activity on your washer/dryer and alert you when they were finished. They do this via detecting no motion after a while, and will remind you every so often to get up from the TV, and go check the laundry.
